content: How do I reset my company email password?
To reset your company email password, please visit the internal password reset portal at https://reset.company.com and follow the instructions. If you encounter any issues, contact IT support.
My computer is running slow, what should I do?
Try restarting your computer and closing unused applications. If the issue persists, please run a virus scan and contact IT support for further assistance.
How do I connect to the company VPN?
To connect to the company VPN, open the VPN client, enter your credentials, and click 'Connect'. Detailed instructions are available on the IT HelpDesk portal.
I can't print from my workstation.
Please check if the printer is powered on and connected to the network. Try reinstalling the printer driver. If the problem continues, contact IT support.
